TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlType extends System.Windows.Automation.AutomationIdentifier

summary.span: Identifies the type of a user interface (UI) control.

span.span: Identifies the type of a user interface (UI) control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 继承自，用于标识所表示的控件的类型。 inherits from and is used to identify the type of a control represented by an . 控件类型的 UI 自动化提供程序开发人员确定。The control type is determined by the developer of the UI Automation provider. 此类包含静态字段，这本身就是对象，以确定控件的标准类型。This class contains static fields, which are themselves objects, to identify the standard types of controls. 此外，还有不匹配定义的类型之一的控件的类型。There is also a type for controls that do not match one of the defined types. 唯一的情形，控件的控件类型可能要在运行时更改是该控件支持的其中。The only case where a control's control type might change at run time is where the control supports . 一个示例是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)]列表视图，它可以是或，取决于当前的视图。An example is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] list view, which can be a or , depending on the current view. 控件类型不具有一对一的等同关系与控件模式。Control types do not have a one-to-one equivalence to control patterns. 控件可以是仅有一个类型，但它可能支持多个模式或无模式，具体取决于其特定的功能。A control can be of only one type, but it may support multiple patterns or no patterns at all, depending on its specific functionality. 有关详细信息的各种控件类型，请参阅[UI 自动化控件类型](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types.md)。For detailed information on the various control types, see [UI Automation Control Types](~/docs/framework/ui-automation/ui-automation-control-types.md).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Button
Public Shared ReadOnly Button As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a button control.

span.span: Identifies a button control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 按钮执行一个操作时单击。Buttons perform a single action when clicked. 作为独立的控件或其他控件类型的子控件，可以使用一个按钮。A button can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，组合框控件中的下拉箭头是一个按钮。For example, the drop-down arrow in a combo box control is a button. 用作子控件，一个按钮时中的控件视图[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树 （不在内容视图中）。When used as a subcontrol, a button is in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in the content view).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Calendar
Public Shared ReadOnly Calendar As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a calendar control, such as a date-picker.

span.span: Identifies a calendar control, such as a date-picker.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType CheckBox
Public Shared ReadOnly CheckBox As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a check box control.

span.span: Identifies a check box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为独立的控件或其他控件类型的子控件，可以使用复选框。A check box can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，在控件视图中但不是在内容视图，将显示一个用于选择 （用于操作的内容） 的行的网格控件中的行的开头复选框。For example, a check box at the beginning of a row in a grid control that is used to select the row (used to manipulate the content) appears in the control view but not in the content view. 但是，表示数据的窗体中的标记为复选框是中的内容和控件的视图。However, a labeled checkbox in a form that represents data is in the content and control views.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType ComboBox
Public Shared ReadOnly ComboBox As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a combo box control.

span.span: Identifies a combo box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两种变体组合框控件。There are two variations of combo box controls. 简单的组合框显示用户可选择从一个列表。A simple combo box presents a list that a user can select from. 一个可编辑的组合框显示选项列表，还提供用户可在其中键入而不会限定于从列表中提供的选项中选择一个选择的可编辑文本区域。An editable combo box presents a list of choices and also has an editable text area where a user can type in a choice instead of being limited to selecting from the choices in the list.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Custom
Public Shared ReadOnly Custom As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a control that is not one of the defined control types.

span.span: Identifies a control that is not one of the defined control types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件类型指示不被标识为一个预定义的控件类型的控件 (如或)。The control type indicates a control that is not identified as one of the predefined control types (such as or ). 控件开发人员应在指定其控件作为之前检查其他控件类型控件以确保其控件不提供的相同功能的方式之一定义的控件类型的类型。Control developers should check the other control types before designating their control as a control type to be sure that their control does not provide the same functionality as one of the defined control types. A控件类型需要额外的工作，以便该提供程序实现[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]。A control type requires extra work for the provider to implement [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]. 此外，UI 自动化客户端产品将不能以应对预期的控件结构、 键盘交互和基于控件的控件类型的可能的控件模式。Also, UI Automation client products will not be able to anticipate the control structure, keyboard interaction, and possible control patterns based on the control type of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType DataGrid
Public Shared ReadOnly DataGrid As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a data grid control.

span.span: Identifies a data grid control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在单元格包含纯文本，控件类型应为。When the cells contain only text, the control type should be .

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType DataItem
Public Shared ReadOnly DataItem As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a data item control.

span.span: Identifies a data item control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是可以包含许多其他控件的复杂项。A is a complex item that can contain many other controls.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Document
Public Shared ReadOnly Document As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a document control.

span.span: Identifies a document control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 文档包含多个行的文本的内容。A document contains text content of more than one line.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Edit
Public Shared ReadOnly Edit As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies an edit control, such as a text box.

span.span: Identifies an edit control, such as a text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为独立的控件或其他控件类型的子控件，可以使用控件。An control can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，用户可在其中键入组合框控件中的值的区域是控件，并且在这种情况下，控件将不属于的内容视图。For example, the area where a user can type in a value in a combo box control is an control, and in this case the control is not part of the content view. 控件还可以表示包含密码的控件。 controls can also represent controls that contain passwords. 属性，如屏幕阅读器，以确定是否显示该内容的产品。The property enables products such as screen readers to know whether to reveal the contents.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern[] GetNeverSupportedPatterns() cil managed

summary.span: Retrieves the pattern identifiers that are not supported by the control type.

span.span: Retrieves the pattern identifiers that are not supported by the control type.
An array of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] pattern identifiers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于等的提供程序实现的需要查找所有不允许对此控件类型的控件模式的测试框架的 UI 自动化客户端。This method is useful for UI Automation clients such as test frameworks for a provider implementation that need to find all control patterns that are not permitted on this control type. ## Examples 下面的示例调用上每个类型的为静态字段中包含类。The following example calls on every kind of contained as a static field in the class. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationPattern[][] GetRequiredPatternSets() cil managed

summary.span: Retrieves an array of sets of required patterns.

span.span: Retrieves an array of sets of required patterns.

returns.span: An array of sets of required patterns.

span.span: An array of sets of required patterns.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组的每个元素包含数组的模式，并且包含此控件类型的每个元素必须支持这些阵列中至少一个。Each element of the array contains an array of patterns, and each element that has this control type must support at least one of these arrays. 此方法可用于需要查找所有可能的模式，如测试提供程序实现的框架的 UI 自动化客户端。This method is useful for UI Automation clients that need to find all possible patterns, such as testing frameworks for a provider implementation. ## Examples 下面的示例调用上每个类型的为静态字段中包含类。The following example calls on every kind of contained as a static field in the class. [!code-csharp[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/CSharp/GetPatternsForm.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAControlTypePatterns_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAControlTypePatterns_snip/visualbasic/getpatternsform.vb#101)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperty[] GetRequiredProperties() cil managed

summary.span: Retrieves an array of the required property [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] for this control type.

span.span: Retrieves an array of the required property [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] for this control type.
An array of property [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于需要查找所有可能的属性，例如测试提供程序实现的框架的 UI 自动化客户端。This method is useful for UI Automation clients that need to find all possible properties, such as testing frameworks for a provider implementation.

Public Shared ReadOnly Group As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a group control, which acts as a container for other controls.

span.span: Identifies a group control, which acts as a container for other controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 组是包含不同的控件类型和用于以逻辑方式将这些控件相关联的容器控件。A group is a container control that contains different control types and is used to logically associate those controls.

span.span: Identifies a hyperlink control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 超链接控件导航到指定[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)]当用户单击控件上。A hyperlink control navigates to a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_url](~/includes/tlasharptla-url-md.md)] when a user clicks on the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType Image
Public Shared ReadOnly Image As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies an image control.

span.span: Identifies an image control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 作为独立的控件或其他控件类型的子控件，可以使用控件类型。An control type can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，一个按钮可用于在映像，而不是文本指示其功能给用户。For example, a button can use an image rather than text to indicate its functionality to the user. 仅对修饰目的使用时，图像将显示的控件视图中[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树 （不在内容视图中）。When used only for decorative purposes, an image appears in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in the content view).

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.ControlType List
Public Shared ReadOnly List As ControlType

summary.span: Identifies a list control, such as a list box.

span.span: Identifies a list control, such as a list box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A是一种包含控件类型和 （可能）控件类型。A is a control type that contains and (perhaps) control types. A作为独立的控件或其他控件类型的子控件，可以使用控件。A control can be used as a standalone control or as a subcontrol in another control type. 例如，组合框中具有包含出现时单击该下拉列表按钮时选择的控件。For example, a combo box has a control that contains choices that appear when the drop-down button is clicked. 当用作子控件，仅在的控件视图[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]树 （不在内容视图中）。When used as a subcontrol, a is only in the control view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree (not in content view). 当用作子控件，没有`Name`分配的属性。When used as a subcontrol, a does not have a `Name` property assigned. A可以包含控件。A can contain controls.

Public Shared ReadOnly Menu As ControlType

remarks.format: ## Remarks 菜单是菜单项; 的集合的容器例如，控件在下面出现**文件**当你单击它并包含**新建**，**打开**，依次类推。A menu is a container for a collection of menu items; for instance, the control that appears beneath **File** when you click on it and that contains **New**, **Open**, and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件类型包含一组按钮和一个 thumb 控件使用户使用鼠标滚动窗口或项容器的内容。A control type contains a set of buttons and a thumb control that enable a user using a mouse to scroll the contents of a window or item container. 使用属性来区分对应于大增量、 大幅度递减、 小递增和小型递减按钮的元素。Use the property to differentiate between the elements that correspond to the large-increment, large-decrement, small-increment, and small-decrement buttons.

summary.span: Identifies a tree control.

span.span: Identifies a tree control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件类型是分层排列的容器或控件类型。A control type is a container for a hierarchical arrangement of or control types. 树的每个节点可以包含其他节点。Each node of a tree can contain other nodes. 一个包含的子节点可以显示为节点展开或折叠。A node that contains child nodes can be displayed as expanded or collapsed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A控件类型可以仅用作子控件的控件。A control type can be used only as a subcontrol of a control.
